alert.note: Alert for Box Elder; Cache (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 16 at 12:03AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northern Utah, including the following counties, Box Elder and Cache. * WHEN...Until 300 AM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1201 AM MDT, trained weather spotters reported urban flooding on Main Street in Brigham City due to heavy rain from thunderstorms. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Brigham City, Perry, Mantua and Mantua Reservoir.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
